short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension extracts and saves the text from a web page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
[Overview]
This extension extracts all text parts of a web page and automatically downloads them as text files.

[Benefits]
1. easy to save the information you need.
2.Longer text can be read or edited at a later time.
Only the text can be saved, with images, advertisements and other superfluous information removed.

[How to use]
1.Make sure the page you want to extract is displayed.
2.Click the extension icon.
3. A text file containing the extracted text will be downloaded.
